title: 求mc好声音全部曲子
author: kangshifu
txt_content: 如题，就mc好声音全部曲子，悬赏500金币

replies.author: hukk
replies.txt_content: BGM自己从游戏目录下找啊

replies.author: kangshifu
replies.txt_content:
hukk 发表于 2013-7-19 08:13 
BGM自己从游戏目录下找啊
怎么找

replies.author: hukk
replies.txt_content:
kangshifu 发表于 2013-7-19 08:31 
怎么找
1.6以前在.minecraft\resources
1.6以后在.minecraft\assets

然后自己搜索音频文件，
http://v.ggg.cn/v_6178/    不错的  4首歌   如果好给500哦

replies.txt_content:

replies.author: znmkjh
replies.txt_content: 额 这个  依次打开 ---minecraft. -------resources----找到---music 和newmusic 里面有音乐文件，最后，求LZ给500块= =

replies.txt_content:
http://pan.baidu.com/share/link? ... 7&uk=2838575159
下載連結
records是唱片音樂
music是背景音樂
我上傳了好久還特地去辦網盤帳號
求求LZ給我500塊了謝謝
